ooc:That's the third time I say that -_-

bic:He come back on the ground "I am Pegatron of the Tsubai ninja clan 
and minion of the shadow spirit.I have come here to proove myself as a 
true warrior.My exigences are simple.I only want a duel.A one on one 
battle."he said.
